types.name: Low Risk Fireworks
types.description: Fireworks acceptable for use by all ages

types.name: Medium Risk Fireworks
types.description: Fireworks recommended for use by adults or children >12 years old

types.name: High Risk Fireworks
types.description: Explosives recommended for use by adults only

types.name: Military/Law Enforcement
types.description: Explosives intended for use by Military/Law Enforcement personnel only

types.name: Civilian Applications
types.description: Explosives intended for use by the general population

types.name: Construction Applications
types.description: Explosives intended for use within demolition/construction environments only
